code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var DarkMode=function DarkMode(){var clickedClass="clicked";var body=document.body;var lightTheme="theme-light";var darkTheme="theme-dark";var theme;if(localStorage){theme=localStorage.getItem("theme");}if(theme===lightTheme||theme===darkTheme){body.classList.add(theme);}else{body.classList.add(lightTheme);}var switchTheme=function switchTheme(e){if(theme===darkTheme){body.classList.replace(darkTheme,lightTheme);e.target.classList.remove(clickedClass);localStorage.setItem("theme","theme-light");theme=lightTheme;}else{body.classList.replace(lightTheme,darkTheme);e.target.classList.add(clickedClass);localStorage.setItem("theme","theme-dark");theme=darkTheme;}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"pointer p-2 text-center ms-3 menu-icon chat-active-btn ".concat(theme==="dark"?clickedClass:""),onClick:function onClick(e){return switchTheme(e);},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{})});};export default DarkMode;
